subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer defeated fourth-seeded Kei Nishikori on Saturday and will play Alejandro Falla in the final of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.
snippet: Roger Federer defeated fourth-seeded Kei Nishikori on Saturday and will play Alejandro Falla in the final of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.
